title: Checkpoint Profile
description: A standalone checkpoint-specific prompt dialect profile. Profiles define base prompts, per-asset-type overrides, tag ordering, and runtime safety tokens for a single checkpoint.

profileId.description: Deterministic profile id, typically checkpointId + profileVersion.

checkpointId.description: The checkpoint this profile is bound to.

defaultForCheckpoint.description: If true, this profile is the default for the checkpoint when no explicit profile is selected.

basePositive.description: Base positive prompt fragment injected for all assets using this checkpoint.

baseNegative.description: Base negative prompt fragment injected for all assets using this checkpoint.

perAssetType.description: Per-asset-type prompt overrides keyed by asset type id.

tagOrderPolicy.description: How to order tag prompt fragments: use checkpoint defaults or an explicit ordered list.

tagOrder.description: Explicit tag ordering when tagOrderPolicy is 'explicit'.

runtimeSafety.description: Safety tokens appended/prepended to final compiled prompts.

positive.description: Safety tokens added to positive prompt.

negative.description: Safety tokens added to negative prompt.
